## Problem Set Overview

This problem set is intended for you to gain experience with fixed-effects panel regression. 


### Problem Set Instructions

1. What is your question? (Recall that your question should be in the form of: What is the association between $x$ (an explanatory variable) and $y$ (some outcome)?)

2. Why is this question interesting?

3. Show evidence that you have assembled a dataset for analysis.


## How to Submit

You should create a new webpage on your Google site titled `Project 3 Problem Set 2`. Submit the link to your Google site webpage in Canvas. You should work on building your own webpage, but only one member of the group needs to submit the link.
